article.title: Newsletters - South Carolina U.S. Export Assistance Centers
article.summary: Learn how to receive newsletters from the South Carolina U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
article.content:
Greetings from the U.S. Commercial Service in South Carolina!

Wewant to keep you informed of the latest news, events, and educational/export opportunities that are available to South Carolina firms.

Upstate​

Denis Csizmadia: 864-250-8429;denis.csizmadia@trade.gov.

Midlands

Dorette Coetsee: 803-777-2571;dorette.coetsee@trade.gov.

Low Country

Phil Minard: 843-746-3404;phil.minard@trade.gov​.
